name: The Pitch
description: The Pitch is a short text-based narrative-driven videogame made with Twine.  It runs on any web browser on any device. Rated 14+ for explicit language. "Often, it all comes down to one guy making a pitch. The entire course of history can change with the right choice of words. In this game, players will experience a spacefaring science-fiction adventure set in the far future, as a rebel army sends a key asset on a sensitive mission: sell this rich bastard on our war, secure the funds needed to win the war, come back home with a closed deal, and secure our freedom forever." Can you ensure our victory, all without firing a shot? Well, we'll see about that.
